entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -24.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pickle Lake Airport 1:58 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

Visibility: 4.0 km

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:39 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 1:39 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
